they're actually a negative contributor so the third reason is turnover

report done by Radford that found that software leads all industries with a

56% of developers have changed jobs within the last two years and the median

of onboarding if you're only going to have them on your team for 18 months and it takes you four or five months just to turn them into a positive contributor
you only actually get positive contributions for a little over a year so it becomes all the more important to
